backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, access control, project data, and risk scoring with CRUD functions and analytics tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend components and features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the React app and setting metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling navigation, theme, onboarding, authentication, and profile setup gating.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright text and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation buttons, chain selector, notifications, and login control.
frontend/src/components/ChainSelector.ts: Popover-based blockchain selector with search and analytics tracking.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity auth with query cache handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal form for creating a user profile with name and optional bio, saving via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/analytics/analytic: Defines analytics event types and manages incrementing and storing counts in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/analytics/Analytic: Displays real-time analytics metrics by polling stored analytics data every second.
frontend/src/features/discover/NewProjec: UI feed showing newly fetched blockchain projects with loading, error, and manual refresh states.
frontend/src/features/discover/projectMa: Defines ProjectSummary and maps raw API data into a normalized project summary format.
frontend/src/features/discover/providers: Provides mock project data generation and simulates API fetching for a chain's projects.
frontend/src/features/discover/useProjec: Custom hook that polls project data periodically and manages loading, error, and refresh states.
frontend/src/features/glossary/glossaryD: Static glossary term definitions categorized by topics like blockchain, defi, NFT, and security.
frontend/src/features/glossary/GlossaryD: Dialog listing glossary terms with search filtering and category badges.
frontend/src/features/learn/learnProgres: Manages lesson completion state in localStorage and exposes helpers to mark and check progress.
Caches generated lesson data in localStorage, provides retrieval and cache management utilities.
frontend/src/features/learn/lessonGenera: Builds lessons from templates with generated dates and retrieves lessons by ID.
frontend/src/features/learn/LessonList.t: Displays lesson cards, tracks completion, and opens lessons while recording analytics events.
frontend/src/features/learn/lessonTempla: Defines lesson and quiz templates containing static content and metadata.
frontend/src/features/learn/LessonViewer: Displays lesson content in a dialog, supports markdown-style formatting, tracks completion, and launches quizzes when applicable.
frontend/src/features/learn/QuizRunner.t: Renders a single-question quiz with answer selection, feedback, analytics logging, and a completion callback.
frontend/src/features/notifications/Noti: Displays notifications in a dialog with read, mark-all, and clear actions.
frontend/src/features/notifications/noti: Handles storing, updating, and managing notifications and preferences in localStorage.
Defines notification types, structures, and user preference interfaces.
frontend/src/features/offline/offlineSta: Provides online/offline status tracking via browser events.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Onboard: Implements a multi-step onboarding modal with progress tracking, skip/complete actions, and step-specific content.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/onboard: Provides state and helpers for tracking onboarding completion using localStorage.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectCa: Displays a project summary card with risk level, metadata, social badges, and opens a detailed dialog.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectDe: Shows a detailed modal with full project info including token details, socials, and risk analysis.
frontend/src/features/risk/RiskBadge.tsx: Renders a visual badge for a project's risk level with icons and color coding.
frontend/src/features/risk/RiskDetails.t: Displays detailed risk assessment info including explanation, signals, and an expandable analysis section.
frontend/src/features/risk/riskHeuristic: Defines risk level types and calculates a project's risk based on audits, team transparency, liquidity, volume, and age.
frontend/src/features/settings/Notificat: Provides switches for enabling or disabling notification preferences for new projects and lessons.
frontend/src/features/settings/ProviderS: Lists data providers with their availability and backend requirements, displaying status indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and updating projects, analytics, and user profile data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/formatting.ts: Utility functions for relative time formatting, timestamp display, and safe URL validation.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a Tailwind-compatible class merging helper using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard hero, feature cards, and stats based on the selected blockchain.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Displays the discovery feed for new blockchain projects.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPage.tsx: Shows a list of educational lessons covering Web3 topics.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides settings for user profile, onboarding reset, offline status info, cache management, and analytics panels.
frontend/src/state/chain.tsx: Defines supported blockchains and provides a React context for selecting and persisting the active chain in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted values across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the CryptoLaunch Sentinel app, its features, architecture notes, and versioned project state.
